name: Scarecrow COOP
description:
Creator's note: This game is my very first experience in creating a multiplayer cooperative game, so do keep in mind that there are going to be a lot of bugs.

"The forest is corrupted, it's feeling contains a horrid presence. It's about time we take care of it."

Scarecrow COOP is a team based cooperative horror adventure game, where you search for 5 scrolls scattered around the forest to cast a clensing spell,
but be aware, there's a presence out there, one meant to scare off the crows...

It's recommended you use headphones on mid-high volume and play with friends!

Warning!
This game contains sudden loud noises!
